tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE sports_equipment (
    equipment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    equipment_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    sport_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    brand VARCHAR(100),
    material VARCHAR(100),
    color VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE 3d_models (
  model_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  model_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  brand VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  category VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  price DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL,
  description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE customization_options (
  option_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  model_id INT REFERENCES 3d_models(model_id),
  option_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  option_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  option_value VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE sports_equipment (
    equipment_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    equipment_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    brand VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    model VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    color VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE customization_options (
    option_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    option_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    price DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL,
    image_url VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE customizations (
    customization_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    equipment_id INT NOT NULL,
    option_id INT NOT NULL,
    selected_option VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    FOREIGN KEY (equipment_id) REFERENCES sports_equipment(equipment_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (option_id) REFERENCES customization_options(option_id)
);

CREATE TABLE sports_equipment (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(255),
  brand VARCHAR(255),
  size VARCHAR(50),
  color VARCHAR(50),
  price DECIMAL(10,2),
  image_url VARCHAR(255)
)

CREATE TABLE gear_customization (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  equipment_id INT,
  customization_option VARCHAR(50),
  customization_value VARCHAR(50),
  FOREIGN KEY (equipment_id) REFERENCES sports_equipment(id)
)

CREATE TABLE user_preferences (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  user_id INT,
  equipment_id INT,
  customization_option VARCHAR(50),
  customization_value VARCHAR(50),
  FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES users(id),
  FOREIGN KEY (equipment_id) REFERENCES sports_equipment(id)
)

CREATE TABLE users (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  username VARCHAR(50),
  email VARCHAR(255),
  password VARCHAR(255)
)

CREATE TABLE sports_equipment (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(255),
  type VARCHAR(50),
  brand VARCHAR(50),
  price DECIMAL(10, 2)
);

CREATE TABLE customization_options (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  equipment_id INT,
  option_name VARCHAR(50),
  color VARCHAR(50),
  material VARCHAR(50),
  FOREIGN KEY (equipment_id) REFERENCES sports_equipment(id)
);

CREATE TABLE users (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(255),
  email VARCHAR(255),
  age INT,
  gender VARCHAR(10)
);

CREATE TABLE user_customizations (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  user_id INT,
  equipment_id INT,
  option_id INT,
  customization_time TIMESTAMP,
  FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES users(id),
  FOREIGN KEY (equipment_id) REFERENCES sports_equipment(id),
  FOREIGN KEY (option_id) REFERENCES customization_options(id)
);

CREATE TABLE sessions (
  session_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  user_id INT,
  start_time TIMESTAMP,
  end_time TIMESTAMP,
  FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES users(id)
);
